HcalModuleIndexReverseLookup.cc

00001 #include <HcalModuleIndexReverseLookup.hh>
00002 //#include <values.h>
00003 #include <climits>
00004 #include <cfloat>
00005 
00006 //#define HCALRECO_DEBUG
00007 
00008 namespace CALICE {
00009 
00010   void HcalModuleIndexReverseLookup::createIndexReverseLookup(const MappingAndAlignment &mapping) {
00011     if (mapping._moduleLocationList.empty() || mapping._moduleTypeList.empty()) return;
00012 
00013     _cellIndexArray.clear();
00014     UInt_t module_i(0);
00015     for (MappingAndAlignment::ModuleList_t::const_iterator module_iter=mapping._moduleLocationList.begin();
00016         module_iter!=mapping._moduleLocationList.end();
00017         module_iter++, module_i++) {
00018       const ModuleDescription &description=mapping._moduleTypeList[module_iter->second.getModuleType()];
00019       const UChar_t mtype = module_iter->second.getModuleType();
00020       int mmtype = (int)mtype;
00021       for (unsigned short cell_i= (mmtype == 7 ? 39 : 0); cell_i != (mmtype == 6 ? 72 : 108); cell_i++) {
00022 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG        
00023               std::cout << " cell_i " << cell_i << " geometricalIndex " << description.getGeometricalCellIndex(cell_i) << std::endl;
00024 #endif
00025         const HcalCellIndex index(description.getGeometricalCellIndex(cell_i) + module_iter->second.getCellIndexOffset());
00026         const unsigned short layer_i=index.getLayerIndex();
00027         const unsigned short tile_row_i=index.getTileRow();
00028         const unsigned short tile_column_i=index.getTileColumn();
00029 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG 
00030         std::cout << "module " << module_i << " module type " << mmtype << " cell " << cell_i << " layer " << layer_i << " tile_row " << tile_row_i << " tile_column " << tile_column_i << std::endl;
00031 #endif
00032         if (_cellIndexArray.size()<=layer_i) _cellIndexArray.resize(layer_i+1);
00033         if (_cellIndexArray[layer_i].size()<=tile_row_i) _cellIndexArray[layer_i].resize(tile_row_i+1);
00034         if (_cellIndexArray[layer_i][tile_row_i].size()<=tile_column_i) _cellIndexArray[layer_i][tile_row_i].resize(tile_column_i+1,USHRT_MAX);
00035         _cellIndexArray[layer_i][tile_row_i][tile_column_i]= cell_i + (module_i << 8);
00036       }
00037     }
00038   }
00039 }
